definition: to treat as/to regard as
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
(onom.) dong/ding dong (bell)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Can you use lipstick on your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 把唇线笔当作眼线笔使用或者反一反？

sentences.english: He took me for his housemaid .
sentences.chinese: 他把我当作他的女佣人了。

sentences.english: I started teaching ESL part-time (English as a Second Language) in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 当作兼职，我从2003年开始教非母语英语课程。

sentences.english: Do not take that commitment for granted.
sentences.chinese: 不要把承诺当作是理所应当的。

sentences.english: The owners of these experiences recognize them as fragmentary semimemories.
sentences.chinese: 这些过往经历的主人把它们当作是零碎的半记忆片段。

sentences.english: Biomass may also include biodegradable wastes that can be burnt as fuel.
sentences.chinese: 生物量还包括能够当作燃料燃烧的可降解废料。

sentences.english: He mistook me for his old friend whom he hadn't seen for years.
sentences.chinese: 他把我当作他多年不见的老朋友了。

sentences.english: This measure may be an indicator of test effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这个测量可以当作测试效力的指示器。

sentences.english: Except Reimer never saw himself as a girl.
sentences.chinese: 但雷蒙从未将自己当作女孩看待。

sentences.english: And if it's taken as the whole truth, and nothing but the truth,it's detrimental.
sentences.chinese: 如果把这当作全部的真理，则是有害的。

sentences.english: Mary took him while her faudio-videoailable ather .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽把他当作本身的父亲。

sentences.english: But their quality call mainly fell on deaf ears in the U.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们在质量方面的呼吁在美国却被当作耳旁风。

sentences.english: Some people regard friendship as a game.
sentences.chinese: 有的人把交朋友当作是逢场作戏。

sentences.english: I took you fMr Green from the Customs just now. May I know your name?
sentences.chinese: 我刚才把你错当作海关的格林先生了。请问尊姓大名？

sentences.english: Janine: Yeah. So it could be whatever.

sentences.chinese: 在中国，刀和布匹被当作钱用。
